title: Taylor Fritz Almost Beat Rafael Nadal at Wimbledon. The Loss Still Hurts.
description: He had beaten Nadal earlier this year to win his first ATP Masters 1000 and is now representing Team World in the Laver Cup for the first time since 2019.
dc:creator: Cindy Shmerler
media:description: Taylor Fritz is the top-ranked American male and No. 12 in the world. He will play for Team World at the Laver Cup.
